articles.author: Aimee Picchi
articles.title: Trump's net worth slumps by as much as $2.4 billion amid DJT stock plunge - CBS News
articles.description: Trump Media & Technology Group's stock, which trades under DJT, is plunging just days before the November 5 election.
articles.content: Trump Media & Technology Group has had a wild stock market ride this month. After quadrupling in price just days before, the stock has lost 31% of its value during a two-day decline, shaving abou… [+3092 chars]

articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: OpenAI launches its Google challenger, ChatGPT Search - TechCrunch
articles.description: OpenAI has launched its Google challenger: ChatGPT Search. It lets ChatGPT users more easily search the web for up-to-date info.
articles.content:
OpenAI’s Google challenger is finally here.
The company on Thursday launched ChatGPT Search, an evolution of the SearchGPT prototype it unveiled this summer. Built into OpenAI’s ChatGPT platform, Ch… [+2176 chars]
